-- | Enumerator-based API for Expat
--   
--   Enumerator-based API for Expat
@package expat-enumerator
@version 0.1.0.2


module Text.XML.Expat.Enumerator

-- | Encoding types available for the document encoding.
data Encoding :: *
ASCII :: Encoding
UTF8 :: Encoding
UTF16 :: Encoding
ISO88591 :: Encoding

-- | A replacement for <a>XMLParseError</a>, defined so it can be given a
--   non-orphan <a>Exception</a> instance.
data ParseError
ParseError :: Text -> XMLParseLocation -> ParseError
parseErrorMessage :: ParseError -> Text
parseErrorLocation :: ParseError -> XMLParseLocation
parseBytesIO :: MonadIO m => Maybe Encoding -> Enumeratee ByteString Event m b
parseTextIO :: MonadIO m => Enumeratee Text Event m b
instance Typeable ParseError
instance Show ParseError
instance Exception ParseError
